Class AlertBox

AlertBox provides a way to push Alerts to a div.

Hierarchy

  • AlertBox

Index

Constructors

  • constructor

Properties

  • selector

Methods

  • clear

Constructors

constructor

  • new AlertBox(selector: string): AlertBox
    • Defined in alertBox.ts:12

    Create an AlertBox at the div with the selector.

    Parameters

    • selector: string

      The selector of the div to append alerts to.

    Returns AlertBox

Properties

selector

selector: string
  • Defined in alertBox.ts:12

The selector of the div to push alerts to.

Methods

clear

  • clear(): void
    • Defined in alertBox.ts:36

    Clear the AlertBox of all alerts. If the AlertBox div contains elements other than Alerts, those are cleared as well.

    Returns void

push

  • push(alert: Alert): void
    • Defined in alertBox.ts:26

    Push an alert to the AlertBox.

    Parameters

    • alert: Alert

      The alert to push.

    Returns void
